name: Taste the rainbow
description:
Taste the rainbow is our videogame for the Ludum Dare 38.

Play to be a god combining elements, planets. Create a prosper life, grow trees and let emerge water from the planet's bowels and above all BE CAREFULL WITH THE MOTHERFUCKER BLACK BALLS!!!

DON'T LET THEM MAKE YOU TASTE .... THE TASTE OF RAINBOW!!!

EDIT: buf fixes.
